widget.name: File Displayer
widget.description: Displays images and PDFs with zoom, rotate, and download controls. Office files and other file types can be downloaded.

property.caption: Color temperature shift
property.description: Apply a subtle color temperature shift (0-100) to prevent competitors from copying exact color values.

property.caption: Save button caption
property.description: Caption displayed for the save button. Leave empty to hide the button.

property.caption: On save action
property.description: Optional action executed after the widget exports annotations. Use this to trigger microflows or commits.

property.caption: Delete button caption
property.description: Caption displayed for the delete button. Leave empty or select Do nothing to hide the button.

property.caption: On delete action
property.description: Optional action executed after annotations are cleared. Select Do nothing to hide the button.

property.caption: Cancel button caption
property.description: Caption displayed for the cancel button. Leave empty or select Do nothing to hide the button.

property.caption: On cancel action
property.description: Optional action executed after annotations are reverted. Select Do nothing to hide the button.
